awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 8 wins.

fullplot: The true story of the life of Gavino Ledda, the son of a Sardinian shepherd, and how he managed to escape his harsh, almost barbaric existence by slowly educating himself, despite violent opposition from his brutal father.

title: Father and Master
